product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Superthick Schrader Tube - 20 x 1.75
long_description: A Slime Super Thick Smart Tube is the ultimate choice for flat prevention, providing flat protection that no other tube can match. So go ahead, take the shortcut! Fits 20 x 1.75 in. tires. Tube is 5X thicker than a regular tube and provides unbeatable protection against even the most damaging thorns, glass and debris. Super Thick Smart Tube is fitted with a Schrader valve.
short_description: A Slime Super Thick Smart Tube is the ultimate choice for flat prevention, providing flat protection that no other tube can match. So go ahead, take the shortcut! Fits 20 x 1.75 in. tires.
